about_the_game:
ATTENTION! READ THIS BEFORE BUY IT!

Pact of the Ancients was Male Doll's first attempt to work with a 3D action game. We worked hard to make it happen, but during our journey, we noticed that 3D demands a huge step in terms of polish, improvements, bug fixes, and many other things. When that happened, we were already without money to keep working on it, and we decided to show you all our results. Unfortunately, as you can read in reviews, the game still has bugs, and the art lacks polish, but that was what we had. We retired the game for months, but after many people asked to play it, we brought it back and moved it to a brand focused on unique gay game mechanics. We won't be able to provide any support like bug fixes, and we reduced the game's price to less than 40% of its initial price. Buy it having in mind these things. 

Bara, BxB, Gay, Survivor, Magic, Medieval

"Ancient heroes, arise!

In a distant and peaceful kingdom, the people lived in peace, going about their day-to-day routine without major problems. However, suddenly in one day, several portals opened in the nearby regions. These portals led to other dimensions, releasing practically infinite monsters that destroyed and dominated everything they passed through.

The sorcerers of the kingdom then decided to perform an ancient ritual - the Pact of the Ancients, to invoke ancient heroes - and very hot ones - to face this new threat. Follow these nearly invincible heroes on their quest to eliminate their enemies, and discover their steamy past in the process..."

  • 5 Playable Characters with unique skills and behaviors (Hoplite, Demon, Satyr, Barbarian, Defender)

  • 5 Unique Characters;

  • Different types of monsters;

  • Boss fight;

  • Voice over;

  • More than 60 items to unlock;

  • 20 unique active skills;

content_descriptors.notes: This censored version of Pact of the Ancients contains sexualized male characters with a few of them using revealing outfits.
